sentences.en: But people who might benefit from genetic tests are almost as leery.
sentences.cn: 但是那些可能会从基因检查中受益的人们对此几乎持同样的谨慎态度.

sentences.en: Executives say they are leery of the proposed system.
sentences.cn: 行政人员们说他们对拟建中的系统心怀顾虑。

sentences.en: He is leery of our proposal.
sentences.cn: 他不随便附和我们的提案[对我们的提案存有戒心].

sentences.en: I tend to be a bit leery of cut - price ` bargains '.
sentences.cn: 我对减价商品有点戒心.

sentences.en: I would be very leery of an up day on light volume.
sentences.cn: 我会非常谨慎地看到价升量减.

sentences.en: I'm as leery of certain polls as anyone.
sentences.cn: 我和任何人一样对某些民意测验持怀疑态度.

sentences.en: The AI will be leery about attacking your armies!
sentences.cn: 电脑一般不去攻击你的军团.

sentences.en: They leery of unsolicited email attachments, and careful about the web sites they visit.
sentences.cn: 他们对不请自来的电子邮件附件很警惕, 对于访问什么网站也很谨慎.

sentences.en: They were leery about investing in a company controlled by a single individual.
sentences.cn: 他们不太放心把资金投向一间由一人独自操控的公司。

sentences.en: Yields on higher - quality companies are dramatically lower as investors feel less leery about corporate debt.
sentences.cn: 随着投资者对公司债的戒心降低,评级较高的公司债券的收益率也大幅下降.

sentences.en: You'd better go through all terms in the contract in leery before you sign it.
sentences.cn: 在签署合同之前,你最好(机敏的,细心的)把每一项条款过一遍.

words.tran_cn: 机敏的；狡猾的；猜疑的；送秋波的

trans.tran_cn: 留神的，猜疑的，机敏的，机警的
trans.tran_en: If you are leery of something, you are cautious and suspicious about it and try to avoid it
